title: JAMES BOND 007 poster
content:
Hi friend

please help me id the fonts used for the poster of James Bond 007

[http://www.movieposter.com/posters/archive/main/7/A70-3860](http://web.archive.org/web/20131215012322/http:/www.movieposter.com/posters/archive/main/7/A70-3860)

thanks in advance

Miguel
author: hernando

comments.content: [ITC Bookman](http://web.archive.org/web/20131215012322/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/itc_bookman_std_demi_bold_italic/?sample_text=JAMES%20BOND%20&sample_size=48) for the JAMES BOND. The 007 is likely a custom lettered logo.
